definition: to defeat/to damage/to lose (to an opponent)/to fail/to wither

sentences.english: The company had to kickback a lot to the corrupt officer.
sentences.chinese: 這家公司必須給腐敗的政府官員很大一筆佣金。

sentences.english: The facts indicate that in most cases, power still corrupts.
sentences.chinese: 實事證明，在大部分情況下，權力會使人腐敗。

sentences.english: The corruption of administrative power is a headachy problem, which plagues most countries and their people.
sentences.chinese: 行政權力腐敗是一個令各國政府和人民頭痛的問題。

sentences.english: The humiliating grip of corruption and tyranny is being pried open.
sentences.chinese: 腐敗和暴政的恥辱枷鎖已被打開。

sentences.english: The inequality and immorality of the politicians leads to political corruption.
sentences.chinese: 政者不正，政者缺德，必須導致政治的腐敗。

sentences.english: Corruption is another word for it. One of my closest friends in India.
sentences.chinese: 腐敗也會隨之而來，我來自印度的最好的朋友之一。

sentences.english: What we call for [is] all the sectors to work with us in dealing with the corruption.
sentences.chinese: 我們呼籲的是讓所有部門和我們一起來對付腐敗問題。

sentences.english: New progress has been made in improving Party conduct, promoting integrity and combating corruption.
sentences.chinese: 黨風廉政建設和反腐敗鬥爭取得新成效。

sentences.english: Work harder to build an honest government, punish graft and corruption
sentences.chinese: 加強廉政建設，懲治貪污腐敗。

sentences.english: The whole family is rotten to the core.
Political corruption, questions and so on famine relief measures difficult line.
sentences.chinese: 政治腐敗，致使荒政難以施行等問題。

sentences.english: And there has been a recent crackdown on the corrupt nexus between developers and officials.
sentences.chinese: 近期政府又打擊了一起官商勾結的腐敗問題。

sentences.english: But his anti-corruption law and an ethics task-force did not go far enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的反腐敗法和道德工作推動力遠遠還不夠。

sentences.english: Just listen, understand, what is the cause of corruption.
sentences.chinese: 好好聽，去理解，腐敗墮落的起因是什麼？

sentences.english: In the former Soviet Union, corruption scandals can spark usurpation.
sentences.chinese: 在前蘇聯，腐敗醜聞可引發篡權。

sentences.english: We will strengthen our efforts to promote clean government and combat corruption.
sentences.chinese: 加強廉政建設和反腐敗工作。
